info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 2:23PM CDT until July 17 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MADISON...SOUTHWESTERN MACOUPIN AND SOUTHEASTERN JERSEY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS...NORTHEASTERN ST. CHARLES AND NORTHEASTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI... At 221 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elsah, moving east at 20 mph A second severe thunderstorm was located near Orchard Farms. This storm was also moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Florissant, Alton, Godfrey, Bellefontaine Neighbors, Black Jack, Riverview, Spanish Lake, East Alton, Brighton, Grafton, Elsah, West Alton, Portage Des Sioux, Orchard Farms, Glasgow Village, Castle Point, Otterville, Delhi, and McClusky. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
